parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From a compound of a and a derivative of tithemi; to set aside, i.e. to disesteem, neutralize or violate.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
First, before, principal, most important. Contracted superlative of pro; foremost.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
